synopsis.text: Gorou Shigeno is a talented young baseball pitcher striving to become the world's best. His journey continues as he plays with the Indiana Hornets, seeking to win the prestigious World Series. However, Gorou faces an unexpected setback when he gets injured during a pivotal match against his rival. Though challenged, Gorou persists in chasing his dreams, pouring his heart and soul into every pitch on the path towards his desired future. This OVA project adapts the previously unanimated World Series arc from the popular Major baseball manga, depicting the long-awaited final showdown between rivals. It marks the poignant conclusion to the anime adaptation of the manga, bringing back fan favorite characters like Gorou and showcasing his determination through high-speed pitching. By overcoming obstacles and forging ahead, Gorou embodies the spirit of perseverance - a moving reminder that one can achieve their goals through dedication and effort.
